title: 'Boys and Girl - HOF Game, McCarthy's Future and Dak's Status with Jon Machota
itunes:title: 'Boys and Girl - HOF Game, McCarthy's Future and Dak's Status with Jon Machota
description:
On today’s episode of the 'Boys and Girl Podcast, Jane and Bobby welcome Jon Machota from The Athletic to discuss the Hall of Fame game, Mike McCarthy’s future, and the status of Dak Prescott’s injury. Follow Jane and Bobby on Twitter and subscribe to get all the latest inside information from two of the most connected people in the Cowboys’ community.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
